Global.name: Felipe Moreno
Global.keywords: Frontend Developer, Front-end Developer, Front End Developer, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Angular, LitElement, Web Components, Node.js, Next.js, Redux, Unit testing (Jest, React testing, Jasmine, angular testing), Git, SCRUM, BEM, CSS, HTML5, SASS, Material, Bootstrap, MongoDB, Mongoose, Express.js, Firebase, Figma, Jira

About.title: About Me
About.description: Frontend Developer with 5 years of professional experience in banking and corporate environments, specialized in creating scalable, secure, and high-performance web applications using React and Next.js. Experienced working under agile methodologies (SCRUM), version control with Git, and best practices for continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD). Over the last year, I have expanded my profile toward Full Stack, participating in the development of APIs and backend logic.

experience.title: Alfheim
experience.achievedObjective: Currently serving as a Frontend Developer, creating highly complex internal web applications for the organization's internal clients. These applications support critical business processes, with a strong focus on scalability, security, and performance.

experience.title: Indra
experience.achievedObjective: Developed web components focused on improving client self-management. Implemented unit and E2E tests with frameworks such as Chai, Cucumber, Jasmine, and Jest. Automated integration and deployment flows with Jenkins, Docker, and GitHub Enterprise, applying agile methodologies (SCRUM, Gitflow). I have certified experience in CELLS and Secure Development, applying security best practices from design to production.

experience.title: Endava
experience.achievedObjective: Collaborated on the development of a customer management platform for CoignCard using JavaScript, React, Redux, and React Router. Improved user experience and operational efficiency.

experience.title: Sophos
experience.achievedObjective: Together with my team, we developed a web application focused on automatically granting credit limits for the company Tuya S.A. The frontend was built with TypeScript, Angular, HTML5, and CSS3.

Portfolio.title: Portfolio
Portfolio.description: My passion lies in bringing captivating and user-friendly digital experiences to life. As a frontend developer, my focus is on creating interactive and responsive interfaces that combine technical skills with engaging design. My portfolio reflects my commitment to excellence in web development, highlighting projects where creativity meets functionality to deliver memorable web experiences. From implementing responsive designs to optimizing performance, my goal is to use the latest technologies and standards to drive impactful and immersive projects that delight users and solve challenges effectively.
